verses.verse: And the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Make <WH6213> you two <WH8147> trumpets <WH2689> of silver <WH3701>; of a whole piece <WH4749> shall you make <WH6213> them <WH1961>: that you may use them for the calling <WH4744> of the assembly <WH5712>, and for the journeying <WH4550> of the camps <WH4264>.
And when they shall blow <WH8628> with them <WH2004>, all the assembly <WH5712> shall assemble <WH3259> themselves to you at the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>.
And if they blow <WH8628> but with one <WH259> trumpet <WH5387>, then the princes, which are heads <WH7218> of the thousands <WH505> of Israel <WH3478>, shall gather themselves unto you <WH3259>.
When you blow <WH8628> an alarm <WH8643>, then the camps <WH4264> that lie <WH2583> on the east parts <WH6924> shall go forward <WH5265>.

When you blow <WH8628> an alarm <WH8643> the second time <WH8145>, then the camps <WH4264> that lie <WH2583> on the south side <WH8486> shall take their journey <WH5265>: they shall blow <WH8628> an alarm <WH8643> for their journeys <WH4550>.
But when the congregation <WH6951> is to be gathered together <WH6950>, you shall blow <WH8628>, but you shall not sound an alarm <WH7321>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175>, the priests <WH3548>, shall blow <WH8628> with the trumpets <WH2689>; and they shall be to you for an ordinance <WH2708> for ever <WH5769> throughout your generations <WH1755>.

And if you go <WH935> to war <WH4421> in your land <WH776> against <WH6862> the enemy that oppresses <WH6887> you <WH7321>, then you shall blow an alarm with the trumpets <WH2689>; and you shall be remembered <WH2142> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430>, and you shall be saved <WH3467> from your enemies <WH341>.

Also in the day <WH3117> of your gladness <WH8057>, and in your solemn days <WH4150>, and in the beginnings <WH7218> of your months <WH2320>, you shall blow <WH8628> with the trumpets <WH2689> over your burnt offerings <WH5930>, and over the sacrifices <WH2077> of your peace offerings <WH8002>; that they may be to you for a memorial <WH2146> before <WH6440> your God <WH430>: I am the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430>.

And it came to pass on the twentieth <WH6242> day of the second <WH8145> month <WH2320>, in the second <WH8145> year <WH8141>, that the cloud <WH6051> was taken up <WH5927> from off the tabernacle <WH4908> of the testimony <WH5715>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> took <WH5265> their journeys <WH4550> out of the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai <WH5514>; and the cloud <WH6051> rested <WH7931> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Paran <WH6290>.
And they first <WH7223> took their journey <WH5265> according to the commandment <WH6310> of the Lord <WH3068> by the hand <WH3027> of Moses <WH4872>.

In the first <WH7223> place went <WH5265> the standard <WH1714> of the camp <WH4264> of the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> according to their armies <WH6635>: and over his host was Nahshon <WH5177> the son <WH1121> of Amminadab <WH5992>.
And over the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Issachar <WH3485> was Nethaneel <WH5417> the son <WH1121> of Zuar <WH6686>.
And over the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Zebulun <WH2074> was Eliab <WH446> the son <WH1121> of Helon <WH2497>.
And the tabernacle <WH4908> was taken down <WH3381>; and the sons <WH1121> of Gershon <WH1648> and the sons <WH1121> of Merari <WH4847> set forward <WH5265>, bearing <WH5375> the tabernacle <WH4908>.

And the standard <WH1714> of the camp <WH4264> of Reuben <WH7205> set forward <WH5265> according to their armies <WH6635>: and over his host <WH6635> was Elizur <WH468> the son <WH1121> of Shedeur <WH7707>.
And over the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095> was Shelumiel <WH8017> the son <WH1121> of Zurishaddai <WH6701>.
And over the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> was Eliasaph <WH460> the son <WH1121> of Deuel <WH1845>.
And the Kohathites <WH6956> set forward <WH5265>, bearing <WH5375> the sanctuary <WH4720>: and the other did set up <WH6965> the tabernacle <WH4908> against they came <WH935>.

And the standard <WH1714> of the camp <WH4264> of the sons <WH1121> of Ephraim <WH669> set forward <WH5265> according to their armies <WH6635>: and over his host <WH6635> was Elishama <WH476> the son <WH1121> of Ammihud <WH5989>.
And over the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> was Gamaliel <WH1583> the son <WH1121> of Pedahzur <WH6301>.
And over the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> was Abidan <WH27> the son <WH1121> of Gideoni <WH1441>.

And the standard <WH1714> of the camp <WH4264> of the sons <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> set forward <WH5265>, which was the rereward <WH622> of all the camps <WH4264> throughout their hosts <WH6635>: and over his host <WH6635> was Ahiezer <WH295> the son <WH1121> of Ammishaddai <WH5996>.
And over the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Asher <WH836> was Pagiel <WH6295> the son <WH1121> of Ocran <WH5918>.
And over the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Naphtali <WH5321> was Ahira <WH299> the son <WH1121> of Enan <WH5881>.
Thus were <WH428> the travels <WH4550> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> according to their armies <WH6635>, when they set forward <WH5265>.

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto Hobab <WH2246>, the son <WH1121> of Raguel <WH7467> the Midianite <WH4084>, Moses <WH4872>' father in law <WH2859>, We are journeying <WH5265> unto the place <WH4725> of which the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559>, I will give <WH5414> it you <WH3212>: come you with us <WH2895>, and we will do you good: for the Lord <WH3068> has spoken <WH1696> good <WH2896> concerning Israel <WH3478>.
And he said <WH559> unto him <WH3212>, I will not go; but I will depart <WH3212> to my own land <WH776>, and to my relatives <WH4138>.
And he said <WH559>, Leave <WH5800> us not <WH3651>, I pray you; forasmuch as you know how we are to encamp <WH2583> in the wilderness <WH4057>, and you may be to us instead of eyes <WH5869>.
And it shall be <WH3212>, if you go with us <WH2896>, Yes, it shall be, that what goodness the Lord <WH3068> shall do <WH3190> unto us <WH2895>, the same will we do unto you.

And they departed <WH5265> from the mountain <WH2022> of the Lord <WH3068> three <WH7969> days <WH3117>' journey <WH1870>: and the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the Lord <WH3068> went <WH5265> before <WH6440> them in the three <WH7969> days <WH3117>' journey <WH1870>, to search out <WH8446> a resting place for them <WH4496>.
And the cloud <WH6051> of the Lord <WH3068> was upon them by day <WH3119>, when they went out <WH5265> of the camp <WH4264>.

And it came to pass <WH727>, when the ark set forward <WH5265>, that Moses <WH4872> said <WH559>, Rise up <WH6965>, Lord <WH3068>, and let your enemies <WH341> be scattered <WH6327>; and let them that hate <WH8130> you flee <WH5127> before you <WH6440>.
And when it rested <WH5117>, he said <WH559>, Return <WH7725>, O Lord <WH3068>, unto the many <WH7233> thousands <WH505> of Israel <WH3478>.
